lead_paragraph: An article in some editions on Sunday about the Knicks’ loss to the Charlotte Bobcats, coached by Larry Brown, omitted the name of a current Knicks player who was on the team in January 2006, when Brown was the head coach. Besides David Lee, Nate Robinson and Quentin Richardson, Eddy Curry was also on the roster.
